clusterList.phrase: thinking back on my recent comments at big east media day i believe that i may have overstated my feelings on college baseball and the wvu baseball program
that's the way baseball has gone you never know who you're going to play with who you're going to play for you just go out and play
i owe a lot to the front office and to the teammates i had here the last time i was here i gave up those six homers
